attributes.review: My names is shloom noom room and I am 420 years old when I had downloaded the app to see the updates of trumps campaign I had opened but it took for ever to load so than I just went out to walk my pet rock (his name is gloom). But thatâ€™s not the craziest I was just sleeping in my old man bed when I started hearing â€œsacrifice sacrificeâ€ from my pantry I was horrified to find out it was my potatoes trying to scarfice me so as horrified as I was they started saying â€œbig Cheeto man will now take youâ€ I was so horrified that I started running when they attacked. Then I remember it was this app ever since I downloaded it weird things where happening
attributes.title: Attacking potatoes

attributes.review: To start, this app killed my grandma and dog on the same day. Plus, it called me a thug and started yelling at me. I passed out when the T started spinning because I have epilepsy and had to go to the ER, there should be a warning for that. Than I threw up when I woke up at the hospital because when I opened my phone this picture of a disgusting orange rotten cheeto was on my phone and they ran tests on me and found out that I have a severe reaction to the color orange that started around 4 years ago. I would not recommend this app to anyone, I am still recovering from the trauma and hope to eat oranges and any other orange this in Novemeber.
attributes.title: Iâ€™m speechless

attributes.review: I canâ€™t understand why anyone would keep this app after downloading it. The app format: horrible. The content of the app: horrible. This app is extremely unprofessional. I didnâ€™t know they made apps for rapists to run for president ğŸ¤® and it didnâ€™t even tell me that on the app before downloading. Turns out, the same guy accused of sexual assault is also extremely racist, homophobic and xenophobic. AND THEY MADE AN APP FOR HIM?!! Iâ€™m not any of those things and I donâ€™t have an app for me and Iâ€™m not running for president. From downloading this app I can see the person this app is all about generally just hates people. 0/5 stars
attributes.title: Horrible app, awful content

First, was that really that best model you could find? The one dressed in a suit and red tie, yeah, it looks like an angry man-baby-pig whoâ€™s trying to hold in explosive diarrhea. God forbid I see that creature again, my eye doctor told me to stay as far away as possible from it, or Iâ€™ll have to have emergency eye removal surgery. 

     Second, who actually like trump? What was one GOOD thing he accomplished? Nothingâ¤ï¸ 

     Third, Iâ€™m gonna need you to send me a $6,000 check, that featherless vulture already damaged my eyes so bad, they disintegrated, Iâ€™m contemplating about suing, but I think that if you get a gentle heads up, youâ€™ll know next time to get a model who doesnâ€™t looks like a oger sweating profusely. 

     And if you decide not to send me the check for my medical bill, Pray to god that I donâ€™t hunt you down like the animal you are, and remove your toenails with the aid of a pair of pliers, and feed them to you.â¤ï¸

                                                           Sincerely, Disintegrated Eyes

As I was showing my mom, Trump reached out of the screen, put her in a chokehold, and said â€œJynaâ€ quietly into her ear. This caused my moms ear to cave in on itself and then fall off completely. So I started ruching my mom to the hospital, but silly me!! I forgot to delete this app. The whole way there, trump screamed delusional things such as â€œmy dick is big... ext..) this caused me and my mother to simultaneously go into cardiac arrest and die.  Therefore at this time, I am writing this reancarnated as a dog. (Which is NOT my first choice of reancarnation BTW) anyway, âœŠğŸ»âœŠğŸ¼âœŠğŸ½âœŠğŸ¾âœŠğŸ¿

attributes.review: This was by far, the WORST app I have ever used. First off, the president is insanely hideous and as soon as I opened the app I had to see his face. Secondly, Trump is terrible and I hate him (anyone but Cheeto Man 2020). Lastly, I just want to say that he is very ugly and I don't want to have to deal with his face again. God knows how he landed a chick like Melania. The only reason I am leaving a one-star review is, well, it requires me to do so in order to write this, but also because the people who worked on this seemed to have worked hard on this and I feel bad. Basically the only reason I am doing this is because Cheeto Man needs to GO.
attributes.title: NEEDS TO BE TAKEN OFF OF APP STORE ASAP!!!!
